dcterms:creator: Sachin Ravi
Hugo Larochelle
dcterms:description: A dataset used for few-shot classification tasks, sampled from ImageNet with 600 instances of 100 classes, where each image is resized to 84x84.
dcterms:title: Mini-Imagenet

dcterms:creator: Brenden M Lake
Ruslan Salakhutdinov
Joshua B Tenenbaum
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1623 character classes with different alphabets, where each class consists of 20 instances. The dataset is used for 20-way 1-shot classification.
dcterms:title: Omniglot

dcterms:creator: Mingzhang Yin
George Tucker
Mingyuan Zhou
Sergey Levine
Chelsea Finn
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset created for few-shot regression tasks, involving the regression of sine waves with varying amplitudes.
dcterms:title: Sinusoids
